original_title: セックスレス若妻とシングルマザーのレズ不倫 紗々原ゆり 武藤あやか
overview: Yuri and Ayaka are mom friends who met in the park. Two women who can't handle their lust...Ayaka who wakes up to lesbian sex and Yuri who is smoldering in a sexless life. At Ayaka's invitation, Yuri falls into a forbidden lesbian affair between married women... The more you think it's no good, the more wet the woman's pussy gets.
title: A Sex-Deprived Young Wife and Single Mother Commit Lesbian Adultery Yuri Sasahara Ayaka Muto
